# Security Policy

## Supported Versions
I want coding to be easier for everyone. To keep your project safe and optimized, please use these verified safe versions:

| Version | Supported          |
| ~~~~~~~ | ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ |
| 1.0.5   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.0.4   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.0.3   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.0.1   | :white_check_mark: |
| 1.0.0   | :white_check_mark: |

## Why I do this
I want to contribute to the community in a way that doesn't waste my time and helps everybody. My goal is to make coding simpler and more accessible for all developers.

## Reporting a Bug or Issue
If you find a security problem or a major bug, please follow my feedback rules:
1. Open a new Issue.
2. Start your comment with **FEEDBACK:**, **Optimization Tip:**, or **Bug:**.
3. Be specific so I can fix it quickly without unnecessary back-and-forth.
